pr_title: update ws-security and opensaml prereq levels (preparation for jakarta ee9)

timeline.message: update liberty wssecurity and saml sso prereqs
specify version in ehcache bundle export statement
support multiple xmlsec jar versions in the repository

timeline.bodyText: I don't think the class-path  should point to a build/lib/*.jar right?

+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.sts.provider.model.secext;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.trust;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.kerberos;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.policy.interceptors;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.sts.provider.model.xmldsig;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.sts.provider.model.utility;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.wss4j;version=${cxfVersion}, \
+  org.apache.cxf.ws.security.tokenstore;version=${cxfVersion}
+  
+Import-Package:  \
+  !org.apache.cxf.ws.mex.*,\
+  !com.ctc.wstx.*,\
+  !org.codehaus.stax2.*,\
+  !net.sf.ehcache.*,\
+  org.apache.cxf.*, \
+  org.apache.neethi, \
+  org.apache.neethi.builders, \
+  org.apache.wss4j.*, \
+  org.w3c.dom, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.ras, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.ras.annotation, \
+  com.ibm.ws.ffdc, \
+  *
+
+DynamicImport-Package: \
+  com.ctc.wstx.*
+
+Include-Resource: \
+  @${repo;org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-ws-security;3.3.6;EXACT}!/META-INF/DEPENDENCIES, \
+  @${repo;org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-ws-security;3.3.6;EXACT}!/META-INF/LICENSE, \
+  @${repo;org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-ws-security;3.3.6;EXACT}!/META-INF/NOTICE, \
+  @${repo;org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-ws-security;3.3.6;EXACT}!/META-INF/cxf/*,\
+  cxf-ehcache.xml=resources/cxf-ehcache.xml
+
+Archiver-Version:

+ !com.sun.security.jgss, \
+ !org.bouncycastle.asn1, \
+ !org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500, \
+ !org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509, \
+ *
+

+ org.bouncycastle.jce.provider,\
+ org.apache.wss4j.common.crypto,\
+ org.apache.wss4j.common.saml
+

+ @${repo;org.apache.wss4j:wss4j-ws-security-common;2.3.0}!/!META-INF/MANIFEST.MF|META-INF/maven/*,\
+ @${repo;org.apache.wss4j:wss4j-ws-security-common;2.3.0}!/templates/**,\
+ @${repo;org.apache.wss4j:wss4j-ws-security-common;2.3.0}!/schemas/**,\
+ @${repo;org.apache.wss4j:wss4j-ws-security-common;2.3.0}!/*xml, \
+ @${repo;org.apache.wss4j:wss4j-ws-security-common;2.3.0}!/*xml, \
+ @${repo;org.bouncycastle:bcprov-jdk15on;1.61;EXACT}!/!META-INF/MANIFEST.MF|META-INF/maven/*
+
+
+Build-Jdk:
